overview_of_class: The course will center on the tension between the nation's foundational promise of equality and the profound inequalities that have persisted since the late nineteenth century. It will pay special attention to the class and race dynamics in U.S. society and to the United States' relationship with the world from the formal colonialism of the late nineteenth century to the wars and interventions of the twenty-first century.
